Category:Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi actors

nodes.text: Orion Lee is a Hong Kong born, Australian actor who portrays Suday Bascus (credited as "Canady's First Order Monitor") in the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. He is best known for playing the co-lead in the 2019 drama film First Cow, Jin Weiun in the British drama series Informer, Ambassador Zhang in the drama series Tyrant and Brian Zhao in the medical drama Critical.
